page.title: 07Ashbourne Choir Boy
page.content: At{St Oswalds Church}I am in the choir.The choir master is Mr C Daly Atkinson.We sing at services. We practise every Tuesday and Thursday and I go to two services every Sunday and have practices after except for the last Sunday in the month.We sing anthems from{Mendelssohn,Bach,and {Tchaikovsky}and lots more composers.My three favourite anthems are The Lord is My Shepherd,Like as the Heart Desireth the Water Brooks,and He Trusted in God.I always ask my mum if I can go early so we can play{tick a {nick or hide and seek}and other games. We never get caught by the choir master.In the sermon we talk and tell jokes and eat sweets.We also perform at{weddings and hospitals.}We sing to the old.We sing at late night Christmas shopping. We have been to {Derby Cathedral}and hope to go again.
